scripts.test:all: npm run test:purescript && npm run test:browser-smoke
scripts.build:example:todomvc: npm exec --yes --package=esbuild -- spago bundle --module Examples.TodoMVC --bundle-type app --platform browser --outfile dist/examples/todomvc.js
scripts.build:example:counter: npm exec --yes --package=esbuild -- spago bundle --module Examples.Counter --bundle-type app --platform browser --outfile dist/examples/counter.js
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:example:todomvc && npm run build:example:counter
